title: General
fullText:
A supply lead used to connect a connectable electrical installation, or the electrical equipment in a tent or non-rigid annexe, to a site supply shall be in one length and comply with Clauses 2.5.2 and 2.5.3.
NOTE 1 See Appendix A for information on electrical supply to tents and non-rigid annexes.
NOTE 2 In New Zealand, the requirement for supply leads to be in one length does not preclude the use of an adaptor, provided it has a suitable IP rating and includes an overcurrent device to limit the current to the rating of the adaptor's plug.
